languages.text: {n}Арджента опускает голову.{/n} "Да. Да. Это ведь я... я находила этих людей, я приводила их к Комиссару, я молилась для них и за них, внушая им надежду. А он... отправлял их под мясницкий нож! Умирать на потеху чудовищам! Быть может, они даже... в свой последний миг думали, что и я их предала!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Арджента опускает голову.{/n} "Да. Да. Это ведь я... я находила этих людей, я приводила их к комиссару, я молилась для них и за них, внушая им надежду. А он... отправлял их под мясницкий нож! Умирать на потеху чудовищам! Быть может, они даже... в свой последний миг думали, что и я их предала!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента опускает голову.{/n} "Да. Да. Это ведь я... я находила этих людей, я приводила их к Комиссару, я молилась для них и за них, внушая им надежду. А он... отправлял их под мясницкий нож! Умирать на потеху чудовищам! Быть может, они даже... в свой последний миг думали, что и я их предала!"

And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは頭を垂れる。{/n}「そうよ。あの人たちを見つけ、コミッサーに連れて行ったのは私なの。彼らのために祈り、希望を与えた。それなのにやつは…彼らを屠殺場に送りやがった！あの怪物どもの娯楽のために！みんなは私までもが…最後の瞬間に彼らを裏切ったと思ったでしょうね！」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは頭を垂れる。{/n}「そうよ。あの人たちを見つけ、コミッサーに連れて行ったのは私なの。彼らのために祈り、希望を与えた。それなのにやつは…彼らを屠殺場に送りやがった！あの怪物どもの娯楽のために！みんなは私までもが…最後の瞬間に彼らを裏切ったと思ったでしょうね！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔垂下了头。{/n}“是啊，正是如此。是我……找到了那些人，是我把他们带到了政委那里，为他们祈祷，给他们希望。可他……他却把那些人送到了屠宰场！让他们沦为那些怪物的玩物！说不定他们……他们在最后的时刻，说不定以为我也背叛了他们！”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔垂下了头。{/n}“是啊，正是如此。是我……找到了那些人，是我把他们带到了政委那里，为他们祈祷，给他们希望。可他……他却把那些人送到了屠宰场！让他们沦为那些怪物的玩物！说不定他们……他们在最后的时刻，说不定以为我也背叛了他们！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta cuelga su cabeza.{/n} «Sí. Lo soy. Yo fui quien... encontró a esas personas, las llevé ante el Comisario, recé por ellas y les di esperanza. Y él... los envió al matadero, a morir para la diversión de esos monstruos. En sus últimos momentos puede que pensaran que yo también les había traicionado».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta cuelga su cabeza.{/n} «Sí. Lo soy. Yo fui quien... encontró a esas personas, las llevé ante el Comisario, recé por ellas y les di esperanza. Y él... los envió al matadero, a morir para la diversión de esos monstruos. En sus últimos momentos puede que pensaran que yo también les había traicionado».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ja. Das stimmt. Ich war es ... Ich habe diese Leute gefunden, ich habe sie zum Kommissar gebracht, ich habe für sie gebetet, und ich habe ihnen Hoffnung gegeben. Und er ... er hat sie in ein Schlachthaus geschickt! Um zur Belustigung dieser Monster zu sterben! Vielleicht ... vielleicht haben sie in ihren letzten Augenblicken gedacht, dass auch ich sie verraten habe!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ja. Das stimmt. Ich war es ... Ich habe diese Leute gefunden, ich habe sie zum Kommissar gebracht, ich habe für sie gebetet, und ich habe ihnen Hoffnung gegeben. Und er ... er hat sie in ein Schlachthaus geschickt! Um zur Belustigung dieser Monster zu sterben! Vielleicht ... vielleicht haben sie in ihren letzten Augenblicken gedacht, dass auch ich sie verraten habe!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta baisse la tête.{/n} « Oui. C'est moi... qui ai trouvé ces gens. Moi encore qui les ai amenés au commissaire, qui ai prié pour eux et leur ai donné de l'espoir. Et lui... il les a envoyés à l'abattoir ! Tout ça pour divertir ces monstres ! Peut-être... Peut-être que dans leurs derniers instants, ils ont cru que moi aussi, je les avais trahis ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta baisse la tête.{/n} « Oui. C'est moi... qui ai trouvé ces gens. Moi encore qui les ai amenés au commissaire, qui ai prié pour eux et leur ai donné de l'espoir. Et lui... il les a envoyés à l'abattoir ! Tout ça pour divertir ces monstres ! Peut-être... Peut-être que dans leurs derniers instants, ils ont cru que moi aussi, je les avais trahis ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta başını eğiyor.{/n} "Evet, bu dediklerin. Onları bulup... Komiser'e götüren bendim. Onlar için dua ettim, onlara umut verdim. O da... Zavallıları mezbahaya gönderdi! O canavarlar eğlensin diye öldüler! Belki... Son nefeslerini vermeden evvel belki beni de hain sanmışlardır!"
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta hangs her head.{/n} "Yes. I am. I was the one... who found those people, I brought them to the Commissar, I prayed for them, and I gave them hope. And he... he sent them to an abattoir! To die for those monsters' amusement! They might have... In their final moments, they might have thought that I, too, had betrayed them!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta başını eğiyor.{/n} "Evet, öyle. Onları bulup... Komiser'e götüren bendim. Onlar için dua ettim, umut verdim. O da... zavallıları mezbahaya gönderdi! O canavarlar eğlensin diye öldüler! Belki... Son nefeslerini vermeden evvel belki beni de hain sanmışlardır!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
